name: Arya Stark
quotes:
Arya Stark: I want to see the captain.

Ternesio Terys: You're seeing him.

Arya Stark: I want to go north, to the wall.

Ternesio Terys: No you don't.

Arya Stark: I can pay.

Ternesio Terys: There is nothing in the north but ice and war and pirates.

Arya Stark: I wouldn't need a cabin. Please, I could work, scrubbing the floors, or...

Ternesio Terys: I'm not going north, child, we're going home.

Arya Stark: Where's home?

Ternesio Terys: The Free City of Braavos.

Arya Stark: Wait, I have something else.

Ternesio Terys: More silver won't make a difference.

Arya Stark: [shows the coin that Jaqen H'ghar gave her] It's not silver, it's iron.

Ternesio Terys: How did you...

Arya Stark: Valar morghulis.

Ternesio Terys: Valar dohaeris. Of course, you shall have a cabin.

Arya Stark: [to Brienne] The Bloody Gate's ten miles.

Brienne of Tarth: I swore to your mother, by the Old Gods and the New...

Arya Stark: I don't care what you swore!

Brienne of Tarth: Arya...

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: [interrupts] You heard the girl! She's not coming with you.

Brienne of Tarth: [stubbornly] She is.

[the Hound draws his sword partly, and Brienne does the same]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: You're not a good listener.

[the Hound looks at Brienne's sword]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Valyrian steel... I've always wanted some Valyrian steel.

Brienne of Tarth: [to Arya] Come with me, Arya. I'll take you to safety.

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: [snaps] Safety? Where the FUCK'S that? Her aunt in the Eyrie's dead! Her mother's dead! Her father's dead! Her brother's dead! Winterfell is a pile of rubble! There's no "safety," you dumb bitch. You don't know that by now, you're the wrong one to watch over her.

Brienne of Tarth: And that what you're doing? Watching over her?

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Aye, that's what I'm doing.

[Brienne fully draws her sword, and the Hound does the same. They fight, while Arya and Pod are watching]

[Brienne and Pod encounter Arya and the Hound]

Brienne of Tarth: Seven blessings. I'm Brienne of Tarth. This is Podrick Payne.

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: You want something?

Podrick Payne: [quietly to Brienne] That's Sandor Clegane. The Hound.

[Brienne looks intently at Arya]

Brienne of Tarth: [to Arya] You're Arya Stark.

[the Hound grabs the hilt of his sword]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: I asked if you wanted something.

Brienne of Tarth: I swore to your mother I would bring you home to her.

Arya Stark: My mother's dead.

Brienne of Tarth: [steps closer] I know. I wish I could have been there to protect her.

Arya Stark: You're not a northerner.

Brienne of Tarth: No, but I swore a sacred vow to protect her.

Arya Stark: Why didn't you?

Brienne of Tarth: She commanded me to bring Jaime Lannister back to King's Landing.

Arya Stark: [to Brienne] The bloody gate's ten miles.

Brienne of Tarth: I swore to your mother, by the Old Gods and the New...

Arya Stark: [interrupts] I don't care what you swore.

Brienne of Tarth: Arya...

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: [interrupts] You heard the girl! She's not coming with you.

Brienne of Tarth: [stubbornly] She is.

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: [Sandor draws his sword, and Brienne does the same] You're not a good listener.

[He looks at her sword]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Valyrian steel... I've always wanted some Valyrian steel.

Brienne of Tarth: [to Arya] Come with me, Arya. I'll take you to safety.

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: [snaps] Safety? Where the FUCK'S that? Her aunt in the Eyrie's dead! Her mother's dead! Her father's dead! Her brother's dead! Winterfell is a pile of rubble! There's no "safety," you dumb bitch. You don't know that by now, you're the wrong one to watch over her.

Brienne of Tarth: And that what you're doing? Watching over her?

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Aye. That's what I'm doing.

aliases: Barristan the Bold , Arstan Whitebeard , Ser Grandfather , Barristan the Old , Old Ser
allegiances: House Selmy of Harvest Hall , House Targaryen of King's Landing

aliases: Brotherfucker, The bitch queen
name: Cersei Lannister
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Light of the West , Queen Dowager , Protector of the Realm , Lady of Casterly Rock , Queen Regent
quotes:
Cersei Lannister: When you marched into the throne room to tell me we'd won the Battle of Blackwater...

[Tywin is walking away]

Cersei Lannister: [voice raised] Do you remember?

[Tywin stops and turns to Cersei]

Cersei Lannister: I was sitting on the Iron Throne with Tommen. I was about to give him essence of nightshade. That's how far I was willing to go when I thought someone awful had come to take my son away. Someone awful is coming to take him away.

Tywin Lannister: No.

Cersei Lannister: Joffrey is dead. Myrcella's been sold like livestock. And now you want to ship me off to Highgarden and steal my boy. My last boy. Margaery will dig her claws in, you will dig your claws in and you'll fight over him like beasts until you rip him apart. I will burn our house to the ground before I let that happen.

Tywin Lannister: And how will you do that?

Cersei Lannister: I'll tell everyone the truth.

Tywin Lannister: What truth would that be?

Cersei Lannister: You don't know, do you? You never believed it. How is that possible? What am I saying? Of course it's possible. How can some so consumed by the idea of his family have any conception what his actual family was doing? We were right there in front of you, and you didn't see us. One look in the past 20 years, one real look at your own children and you would have known.

Tywin Lannister: Known what?

Cersei Lannister: Everything they say is true, about Jaime and me.

Tywin Lannister: No.

Cersei Lannister: Your legacy is a lie.

Tywin Lannister: I don't believe you.

Cersei Lannister: [smirking] Yes, you do.

aliases: Dany , Daenerys Stormborn , The Unburnt , Mother of Dragons , Mother , Mhysa , The Silver Queen , Silver Lady , Dragonmother , The Dragon Queen , The Mad King's daughter
name: Daenerys Targaryen
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms , Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea , Breaker of Shackles/Chains , Queen of Meereen , Princess of Dragonstone

aliases: Onion Knight , Davos Shorthand , Ser Onions , Onion Lord , Smuggler
allegiances: House Baratheon of Dragonstone , House Seaworth of Cape Wrath
name: Davos Seaworth
titles: Ser , Lord of the Rainwood , Admiral of the Narrow Sea , Hand of the King
quotes:
Stannis Baratheon: Do you know who I am?

Mance Rayder: Never had the pleasure.

Davos Seaworth: This is Stannis Baratheon, the one true king of the Seven Kingdoms.

Mance Rayder: We're not in the Seven Kingdoms and you're not dressed for this weather.

Stannis Baratheon: It is customary to kneel when surrendering to a king.

[pause]

Mance Rayder: We do not kneel.

Stannis Baratheon: I'll have thousands of you men in chains by nightfall, have nowhere to put them, have nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.

Mance Rayder: All the same, we do not kneel.

allegiances: House Clegane , House Lannister of Casterly Rock
name: Gregor Clegane

aliases: Aurochs
name: Grenn
means_of_death: Killed fighting the giant Mag the Mighty in the Battle of Castle Black

aliases: Hodor
name: Hodor

aliases: The Kingslayer , The Lion of Lannister , The Young Lion , Cripple

titles: Ser , Lord Commander of the Kingsguard , Warden of the East (formerly)
quotes:
[the cell door opens]

Tyrion Lannister: Oh, get on with it, you son of a whore!

Jaime Lannister: Is that any way to speak about our mother?

name: Janos Slynt
titles: Commander of the City Watch Lord of Harrenhal
means_of_death: Beheaded for insubordination by Jon Snow

aliases: Little Grandfather
name: Jojen Reed
means_of_death: Mercy killed by Meera after being stabbed multiple times by a wight; burned by a fireball thrown by “the Children”

aliases: Lord Snow , Ned Stark's Bastard , The Snow of Winterfell , The Crow-Come-Over , The 998th Lord Commander of the Night's Watch , The Bastard of Winterfell , The Black Bastard of the Wall , Lord Crow
name: Jon Snow
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Lord Commander of the Night's Watch
means_of_death: Stabbed by Night’s Watch mutineers, including Alliser Thorne and Olly
quotes:
Mance Rayder: One of our giants went into your tunnel and never came out again. Mag the Mighty.

Jon Snow: He's dead. He killed my friend, Grenn.

Mance Rayder: He was their king. The last of a blood line that stretches back before the First Men.

Jon Snow: Grenn came from a farm.

Mance Rayder: [raises cup for a toast] Mag and Grenn.

Jon Snow: [raises cup in response] Grenn and Mag.

[they drink]

Tormund Giantsbane: Did you love her?

[Jon does not reply]

Tormund Giantsbane: She loved you.

Jon Snow: She told you?

Tormund Giantsbane: No. All she ever talked about was killing you. That's how I know.

name: Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane
quotes:
Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: [to Arya] You remember where the heart is?

[pause]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Fuck it, I'm ready. Go on, girl. Another name off your list. You kept promising me.

[Arya stares at the Hound]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: I cut down your butcher's boy. The ginger. He was begging for mercy. "Please, Ser. Please don't kill me. Please, please." Bled all over my horse. Saddle stunk of butcher's boy for weeks. Your sister... your pretty sister. I should have taken her. That night the Blackwater burned. I should have fucked her bloody. At least I'd have one happy memory.

[Arya still stares at the Hound]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Do I have to beg you? Do it... do it...

[the Hound is near tears]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Do it.

[Arya takes the Hound's money and walks away]

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: Kill me... Kill me!... Kill me!... KILL ME!

name: Shae
means_of_death: Strangled to death by Tyrion Lannister
quotes:
[after being released from jail by Jaime, Tyrion sneaks into his father's chambers. He finds Shae in Tywin's bed, wearing the golden chain he gave her once]

Shae: [mumbles] Tywin? My lion.

[Shae raises her head. As her vision becomes clear, she sees Tyrion, looking hurt and betrayed. She grabs a knife. Tyrion charges at her. They fight, and Tyrion forces her to drop the knife. They continue to struggle violently. Tyrion grabs the chain around her neck and strangles her with it until she is dead. He sinks to the floor and sits next to Shae's lifeless body, weeping]

Tyrion Lannister: I'm sorry... I'm sorry.

[Tyrion stares at the wall across the room and sees several weapons on display, among them a crossbow, and his expression quickly darkens. He takes the crossbow, then heads down the hall to the privy, opening the door to find his father seated upon the toilet]

name: Shireen Baratheon
means_of_death: Burned alive as a sacrifice to the Lord of Light by Melisandre at the order of Stannis Baratheon

aliases: The King in the Narrow Sea , The King of the Painted Table , The King of Dragonstone , The King at the Wall , Azor Ahai reborncome again

name: Ternesio Terys
quotes:
Arya Stark: I want to see the captain.

Ternesio Terys: You're seeing him.

Arya Stark: I want to go north, to the wall.

Ternesio Terys: No you don't.

Arya Stark: I can pay.

Ternesio Terys: There is nothing in the north but ice and war and pirates.

Arya Stark: I wouldn't need a cabin. Please, I could work, scrubbing the floors, or...

Ternesio Terys: I'm not going north, child, we're going home.

Arya Stark: Where's home?

Ternesio Terys: The Free City of Braavos.

Arya Stark: Wait, I have something else.

Ternesio Terys: More silver won't make a difference.

Arya Stark: [shows the coin that Jaqen H'ghar gave her] It's not silver, it's iron.

Ternesio Terys: How did you...

Arya Stark: Valar morghulis.

Ternesio Terys: Valar dohaeris. Of course, you shall have a cabin.

aliases: The Imp , Halfman , The boyman , Giant of Lannister , Lord Tywin's Doom , Lord Tywin's Bane , Yollo , Hugor Hill , No-Nose , Freak , Dwarf
name: Tyrion Lannister
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Acting Hand of the King (former) , Master of Coin (former)
quotes:
[the cell door opens]

Tyrion Lannister: Oh, get on with it, you son of a whore!

Jaime Lannister: Is that any way to speak about our mother?

[after killing Shae, Tyrion takes a crossbow, then heads down the hall to the privy, opening the door to find his father seated upon the toilet. Tywin seems surprised to see Tyrion, but quickly regains his composure]

Tywin Lannister: Tyrion. Put down the crossbow.

[Tyrion does not comply]

Tywin Lannister: Who released you? Your brother, I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we'll go and talk in my chambers.

[Tywin starts to stand, but Tyrion steadies the crossbow, stopping Tywin]

Tywin Lannister: This is how you want to speak to me, hmm? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure.

Tyrion Lannister: All my life you've wanted me dead.

Tywin Lannister: Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that. Even admire it. You fight for what's yours. I'd never let them execute you. Is that what you fear? I'll never let Ilyn Payne take your head. You're a Lannister. You're my son.

[Tyrion does not believe his father]

Tyrion Lannister: I loved her.

Tywin Lannister: Who?

Tyrion Lannister: Shae.

Tywin Lannister: Oh, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.

Tyrion Lannister: I murdered her. With my own hands.

Tywin Lannister: It doesn't matter.

Tyrion Lannister: Doesn't matter?

Tywin Lannister: She was a whore.

Tyrion Lannister: [raises the crossbow] Say that word again...

Tywin Lannister: And what? You'll kill your own father in the privy? No. You're my son. Now, enough of this nonsense.

Tyrion Lannister: I am your son and you sentenced me to die. You knew I didn't poison Joffrey, but you sentenced me all the same. Why?

Tywin Lannister: Enough. We'll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.

Tyrion Lannister: I can't go back there. She's in there.

Tywin Lannister: You're afraid of a dead whore?

[Tyrion shoots Tywin in the belly, knocking him backwards. Tywin groans in pain. Tyrion reloads the crossbow]

Tywin Lannister: You shot me.

[Tywin becomes angry]

Tywin Lannister: Ohh... you're no son of mine.

Tyrion Lannister: I am your son. I have always been your son.

[Tyrion shoots again, killing his father. Tyrion discards the crossbow as he leaves. The door opens, Varys stands there. He is shocked to see Tywin dead]

Lord Varys: What have you done?

[Tyrion does not answer]

Lord Varys: Quickly.

[Varys pulls Tyrion away, bolting the door behind them. He leads Tyrion to a room where is a large crate]

Lord Varys: Trust me, my friend. I brought you this far.

[Varys helps Tyrion to enter the crate, then shuts it. Moments later, the crate is stowed aboard a ship. Varys begins walking back towards the Red Keep, but stops when he hears the bells tolling, signaling that Tywin's body has been discovered. Realizing that returning to the castle is unsafe, Varys turns around and heads back for the ship, sitting next to Tyrion's crate in silence as the ship sails for Essos]

[after being released from jail by Jaime, Tyrion sneaks into his father's chambers. He finds Shae in Tywin's bed, wearing the golden chain he gave her once]

Shae: [mumbles] Tywin? My lion.

[Shae raises her head. As her vision becomes clear, she sees Tyrion, looking hurt and betrayed. She grabs a knife. Tyrion charges at her. They fight, and Tyrion forces her to drop the knife. They continue to struggle violently. Tyrion grabs the chain around her neck and strangles her with it until she is dead. He sinks to the floor and sits next to Shae's lifeless body, weeping]

Tyrion Lannister: I'm sorry... I'm sorry.

[Tyrion stares at the wall across the room and sees several weapons on display, among them a crossbow, and his expression quickly darkens. He takes the crossbow, then heads down the hall to the privy, opening the door to find his father seated upon the toilet]

aliases: The Lion of Lannister , The Old Lion , The Great Lion of the Rock
name: Tywin Lannister
titles: Lord of Casterly Rock , Shield of Lannisport , Warden of the West , Hand of the King , Savior of the City (of King's Landing)
means_of_death: Shot on the toilet by Tyrion with a crossbow
quotes:
[after killing Shae, Tyrion takes a crossbow, then heads down the hall to the privy, opening the door to find his father seated upon the toilet. Tywin seems surprised to see Tyrion, but quickly regains his composure]

Tywin Lannister: Tyrion. Put down the crossbow.

[Tyrion does not comply]

Tywin Lannister: Who released you? Your brother, I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we'll go and talk in my chambers.

[Tywin starts to stand, but Tyrion steadies the crossbow, stopping Tywin]

Tywin Lannister: This is how you want to speak to me, hmm? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure.

Tyrion Lannister: All my life you've wanted me dead.

Tywin Lannister: Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that. Even admire it. You fight for what's yours. I'd never let them execute you. Is that what you fear? I'll never let Ilyn Payne take your head. You're a Lannister. You're my son.

[Tyrion does not believe his father]

Tyrion Lannister: I loved her.

Tywin Lannister: Who?

Tyrion Lannister: Shae.

Tywin Lannister: Oh, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.

Tyrion Lannister: I murdered her. With my own hands.

Tywin Lannister: It doesn't matter.

Tyrion Lannister: Doesn't matter?

Tywin Lannister: She was a whore.

Tyrion Lannister: [raises the crossbow] Say that word again...

Tywin Lannister: And what? You'll kill your own father in the privy? No. You're my son. Now, enough of this nonsense.

Tyrion Lannister: I am your son and you sentenced me to die. You knew I didn't poison Joffrey, but you sentenced me all the same. Why?

Tywin Lannister: Enough. We'll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.

Tyrion Lannister: I can't go back there. She's in there.

Tywin Lannister: You're afraid of a dead whore?

[Tyrion shoots Tywin in the belly, knocking him backwards. Tywin groans in pain. Tyrion reloads the crossbow]

Tywin Lannister: You shot me.

[Tywin becomes angry]

Tywin Lannister: Ohh... you're no son of mine.

Tyrion Lannister: I am your son. I have always been your son.

[Tyrion shoots again, killing his father. Tyrion discards the crossbow as he leaves. The door opens, Varys stands there. He is shocked to see Tywin dead]

Lord Varys: What have you done?

[Tyrion does not answer]

Lord Varys: Quickly.

[Varys pulls Tyrion away, bolting the door behind them. He leads Tyrion to a room where is a large crate]

Lord Varys: Trust me, my friend. I brought you this far.

[Varys helps Tyrion to enter the crate, then shuts it. Moments later, the crate is stowed aboard a ship. Varys begins walking back towards the Red Keep, but stops when he hears the bells tolling, signaling that Tywin's body has been discovered. Realizing that returning to the castle is unsafe, Varys turns around and heads back for the ship, sitting next to Tyrion's crate in silence as the ship sails for Essos]

Cersei Lannister: When you marched into the throne room to tell me we'd won the Battle of Blackwater...

[Tywin is walking away]

Cersei Lannister: [voice raised] Do you remember?

[Tywin stops and turns to Cersei]

Cersei Lannister: I was sitting on the Iron Throne with Tommen. I was about to give him essence of nightshade. That's how far I was willing to go when I thought someone awful had come to take my son away. Someone awful is coming to take him away.

Tywin Lannister: No.

Cersei Lannister: Joffrey is dead. Myrcella's been sold like livestock. And now you want to ship me off to Highgarden and steal my boy. My last boy. Margaery will dig her claws in, you will dig your claws in and you'll fight over him like beasts until you rip him apart. I will burn our house to the ground before I let that happen.

Tywin Lannister: And how will you do that?

Cersei Lannister: I'll tell everyone the truth.

Tywin Lannister: What truth would that be?

Cersei Lannister: You don't know, do you? You never believed it. How is that possible? What am I saying? Of course it's possible. How can some so consumed by the idea of his family have any conception what his actual family was doing? We were right there in front of you, and you didn't see us. One look in the past 20 years, one real look at your own children and you would have known.

Tywin Lannister: Known what?

Cersei Lannister: Everything they say is true, about Jaime and me.

Tywin Lannister: No.

Cersei Lannister: Your legacy is a lie.

Tywin Lannister: I don't believe you.

Cersei Lannister: [smirking] Yes, you do.

aliases: The Spider , The Eunuch , Rugen , Varys of Lys

name: Ygritte
means_of_death: Shot with an arrow by Olly in the Battle of Castle Black
